Name: Strip Black Jack - At The Pub

People who satisfy themselves. People during sexual intercourse Features: 9 striptease levels, each with different poses! Change the view of the camera or zoom in any time you want! Interactive videos! Awesome graphic! Lots of achievements! Save in the Steam Cloud! At the beginning she's fully dressed. At highest striptease level she plays with various sex toys! When she's really horny, she'll satisfy you! In the end, you even get to sleep with her!
